Monday

9:00 Opening remarks
9:15 Carla Cedarbaum: On extensions of CMC-Bartnik data
10:30 Stefan Czimek: An extension procedure for the constraint equations

2:15 Justin Corvino: A survey of localized constraint deformation
3:30 Iva Stavrov-Allen: On a construction of charged relativistic point particles

Tuesday

9:00 Romain Gicquaud: Conformal constraint equations: old and new
10:15 Paul Allen: The shear-free condition and CMC hyperboloidal initial data

1:30 Dan Lee: The equality case of the spacetime positive mass theorem
2:15 Lan-Hsuan Huang: Rigidity of mass inequalities and static uniqueness
3:30 Problem Session

Wednesday

9:00 Christos Mantoulidis: A geometric view on Brown--York mass
10:15 Greg Galloway: Mass aspect and positive mass theorems for ALH manifolds
